Articles.Content: Since update can't get rocket into orbit once I detach first stage craft becomes uncontrollable with or without engine activated.Before update had no problems.any help would be appreciated.

Welcome aboard!

Can you share a pic of your rocket? And can you describe how you attempt to fly it to orbit? This would be very helpful in figuring out what the issue is.
